name: Deposit (ETH)
specification: The contract accepts a single deposit of ETH through the constructor. The function `withdraw(amount)` can be called by anyone to transfer `amount` ETH to the transaction sender.

properties.wd-leq-init-bal: the overall withdrawn amount does not exceed the initial deposit.
properties.wd-contract-bal: the contract balance is decreased by `amount` after a successful `withdraw(amount)`.
properties.wd-sender-rcv: after a successful `withdraw(amount)`, the balance of the transaction sender is increased by `amount` ETH.
properties.wd-sender-rcv-EOA: after a successful `withdraw(amount)` originated by an EOA, the balance of the transaction sender is increased by `amount` ETH.
properties.wd-not-revert: a transaction `withdraw(amount)` is not reverted whenever the `amount` does not exceed the contract balance.
properties.always-depletable: any user (EOA) at any time can fire a transaction to receive the full balance of the contract.
